mapper.select: SELECT t.*,ta1.AREA_NAME AS province_name, ta2.AREA_NAME AS city_name, ta3.AREA_NAME AS area_name, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM exam_info e1 WHERE e1.exam_period_id = t.id) AS total_num, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM exam_info e2 WHERE e2.exam_period_id = t.id AND e2.result = 1) AS pass_num, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM exam_info e3 WHERE e3.exam_period_id = t.id AND e3.result IS NULL) AS null_num FROM exam_period_info t LEFT JOIN traffic_area ta1 ON ta1.area_no = t.province LEFT JOIN traffic_area ta2 ON ta2.area_no = t.city LEFT JOIN traffic_area ta3 ON ta3.area_no = t.area WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_period_info SET period = #{period}, title = #{title}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, area = #{area}, address = #{address}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_username = #{updateUsername} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE exam_period_info SET status=#{status} WHERE id = #{id}
